vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.11.26; married to Zeruah (H6871);
father of: Jeroboam (H3379)
§ Nebat = "aspect"
an Ephraimite of Zereda, father of king Jeroboam I of the northern kingdom of Israel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre del rey Jeroboam, rey de Israel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼八 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "星相"
一位以法蓮支派的洗利達人, 北國以色列王耶羅波安一世的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼八 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "星相"
一位以法莲支派的洗利达人, 北国以色列王耶罗波安一世的父亲
